page.title: 12LEISURE AROUND LOSCOE
page.content: In Loscoe there is little leisure provision and many of the residents travel to Heanor or Ripley. Older people tend to do more passive than active pursuits. There are places which we go to for leisure. Charles Hill Hall is a small leisure centre which is situated in the middle of Loscoe. Here a number of activities take place, garden parties, football matches.Discos and rollerskating sessions are arranged for the younger generation in the main hall of the sports centre. For middle aged people there are quite a few pubs where they have drinks and entertainment. Old people enjoy the bingo which is held at the Welfare. Some other places were they go to are the chapel or church on Sundays to pray and sing and also to talk to their friends and to get out of the house.
